blogPost.excerpt: This collection is a set of eye-catching vivid holographic gradients that will be a perfect fit to apply onto your web design, logos, any printed designs (business cards, posters, flyers, etc), or social media posts such as Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, etc.
blogPost.body: This collection is a set of eye-catching vivid holographic gradients that will be a perfect fit to apply onto your web design, logos, any printed designs (business cards, posters, flyers, etc), or social media posts such as Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, etc.
blogPost.title: 100+ Colorful Holographic Shapes - Collection of eye-catching vivid holographic gradients
blogPost.author: Riva Yudha

localize.description: 这个系列是一组引人注目的生动的全息渐变，将是一个完美的应用到你的网页设计，标志，任何印刷设计（名片，海报，传单等），或社交媒体帖子，如Instagram，Twitter，Facebook等。
localize.tagline: 一系列醒目生动的全息渐变效果。

localize.description: 這個系列是一組引人注目的生動的全息漸變，將是一個完美的應用到你的網頁設計，標誌，任何印刷設計（名片，海報，傳單等），或社交媒體帖子，如Instagram，Twitter，Facebook等。
localize.tagline: 一系列醒目生動的全息漸變效果。

previous.excerpt: Collection of 90 banners for websites and landing pages. Change the whole text by simple editing just with the master component to check how it works. Compatible with Figma.
previous.title: Banners - 90 Eye-catching website banners in Figma

localize.description: 收集了90个网站和登陆页面的横幅。通过简单的编辑改变整个文本，只需用主组件检查它是如何工作的。与Figma兼容。
收集了90個網站和登陸頁面的橫幅。通過簡單的編輯改變整個文本，只需用主組件檢查它是如何工作的。與Figma兼容。
